text: James Timothy "Tim" Daly (born June 1, 1956) is an American movie, television, stage, voice actor, television and movie director and producer who is known for his roles in Wings and in Superman: The Animated Series. Daly was born in New York City, New York to James Daly and to Hope Newell.David Drake interview with Tim Daly for Broadway.com He studied at The Putney School, at Waldorf School, and at Bennington College. Daly was married to Amy Van Nostrand from 1982 until they divorced in 2010. They had two children. He has been dating actress TÃ©a Leoni since December 2014. title: Tim Daly
